name: Analog Input
description: Demonstrate how to read an analog voltage value from an input pin using the MRAA library, any sensor that outputs a variable voltage can be used with this example code Suitable ones in the Grove Starter Kit are the Rotary Angle Sensor, Light Sensor, Sound Sensor, Temperature Sensor. Connected to A0
author: Intel Corporation

hwreq: Analog sensor connected to pin A0 (Grove Base Shield Port A0)
